options.label: Get User Info
options.name: getUserInfo
options.description: Retrieve basic profile information of the authenticated TikTok user.

options.label: Query Creator Info
options.name: queryCreatorInfo
options.description: Query the authenticated creator's profile and privacy settings for posting.

options.label: List Videos
options.name: listVideos
options.description: List the authenticated user's TikTok video posts.

options.label: Get Video Details
options.name: getVideoDetails
options.description: Get detailed information and metrics for a specified TikTok video.

options.label: Post Video
options.name: postVideo
options.description: Publish a new video to the authenticated user's TikTok account.

options.label: Post Photo
options.name: postPhoto
options.description: Publish a new photo post (carousel) to the authenticated user's TikTok account.

options.label: Get Post Status
options.name: getPostStatus
options.description: Fetch the upload/publish status of a recently posted video or photo.

options.label: List Comments
options.name: listComments
options.description: Retrieve comments on a specified TikTok video (for the authenticated user's post).

options.label: Post Comment
options.name: postComment
options.description: Publish a new comment or reply on a specified TikTok video.

options.label: Delete Comment
options.name: deleteComment
options.description: Delete (hide) a comment on a TikTok video.

options.label: List Ad Accounts
options.name: listAdAccounts
options.description: Get the list of TikTok Ads (advertiser) accounts accessible by the authenticated business user.

options.label: Get Campaigns
options.name: getCampaigns
options.description: Retrieve advertising campaigns under a specified TikTok Ads account.

options.label: Create Campaign
options.name: createCampaign
options.description: Create a new advertising campaign in a TikTok Ads account.

options.label: Update Campaign
options.name: updateCampaign
options.description: Update settings of an existing advertising campaign.

options.label: Get Ad Groups
options.name: getAdGroups
options.description: Retrieve ad groups (ad sets) under a specified campaign or TikTok Ads account.

options.label: Create Ad Group
options.name: createAdGroup
options.description: Create a new ad group (ad set) in a specified campaign.

options.label: Update Ad Group
options.name: updateAdGroup
options.description: Update settings of an existing ad group.

options.label: Get Ads
options.name: getAds
options.description: Retrieve ads under a specified ad group, campaign, or TikTok Ads account.

options.label: Create Ad
options.name: createAd
options.description: Create a new advertisement in a specified ad group.

options.label: Update Ad
options.name: updateAd
options.description: Update settings or status of an existing ad.

options.label: Get Ads Report
options.name: getAdsReport
options.description: Fetch performance metrics and reports for a TikTok Ads account, campaign, ad group, or ad.

options.label: Search Creators
options.name: searchCreators
options.description: Search for creators on the TikTok Creator Marketplace based on filters like name, followers, etc.

options.label: Get Creator Details
options.name: getCreatorDetails
options.description: Retrieve detailed profile and audience insights for a specific creator on the TikTok Creator Marketplace.

inputParameters.label: Advertiser ID
inputParameters.name: advertiserId
inputParameters.description: TikTok Ads account ID (advertiser_id) for Business API operations.

inputParameters.label: Cursor
inputParameters.name: cursor
inputParameters.description: Pagination cursor (timestamp or index) for fetching the next page of results.

inputParameters.label: Max Results
inputParameters.name: maxCount
inputParameters.description: Maximum number of items to retrieve.

inputParameters.label: Video ID
inputParameters.name: videoId
inputParameters.description: The TikTok video ID.

inputParameters.label: Publish ID
inputParameters.name: publishId
inputParameters.description: The publish_id returned when posting content, used to check upload status.

inputParameters.label: Caption
inputParameters.name: caption
inputParameters.description: Caption text for the TikTok post (video or photo).

inputParameters.label: Video URL
inputParameters.name: videoUrl
inputParameters.description: Direct URL to the video file to upload.

inputParameters.label: Photo URLs
inputParameters.name: photoUrls
inputParameters.description: Comma-separated URLs of images for the photo post.

inputParameters.label: Disable Comments
inputParameters.name: disableComment
inputParameters.description: Set to true to disable comments on the post.

inputParameters.label: Disable Duet
inputParameters.name: disableDuet
inputParameters.description: Set to true to disable Duet on the post.

inputParameters.label: Disable Stitch
inputParameters.name: disableStitch
inputParameters.description: Set to true to disable Stitch on the post.

inputParameters.label: Visibility
inputParameters.name: privacyLevel
inputParameters.description: Privacy level for the post's visibility.

inputParameters.label: Auto Add Music
inputParameters.name: autoAddMusic
inputParameters.description: For photo posts, set to true to automatically add background music.

inputParameters.label: Comment Text
inputParameters.name: commentText
inputParameters.description: Text content of the comment to post.

inputParameters.label: Parent Comment ID
inputParameters.name: parentCommentId
inputParameters.description: If replying to a comment, the ID of the parent comment.

inputParameters.label: Comment ID
inputParameters.name: commentId
inputParameters.description: The ID of the comment to delete.

inputParameters.label: Campaign ID
inputParameters.name: campaignId
inputParameters.description: Advertising campaign ID.

inputParameters.label: Ad Group ID
inputParameters.name: adGroupId
inputParameters.description: Advertising ad group (ad set) ID.

inputParameters.label: Ad ID
inputParameters.name: adId
inputParameters.description: Advertising ad ID.

inputParameters.label: Campaign Name
inputParameters.name: campaignName
inputParameters.description: Name of the advertising campaign.

inputParameters.label: Campaign Objective
inputParameters.name: campaignObjective
inputParameters.description: Objective type for the campaign (e.g. Traffic, Conversions).

inputParameters.label: Campaign Budget
inputParameters.name: campaignBudget
inputParameters.description: Total budget for the campaign.

inputParameters.label: Campaign Budget Type
inputParameters.name: campaignBudgetType
inputParameters.description: Budget type for the campaign (daily or lifetime).

inputParameters.label: Status
inputParameters.name: status
inputParameters.description: Status to set (active or paused).

inputParameters.label: Ad Group Name
inputParameters.name: adGroupName
inputParameters.description: Name of the ad group.

inputParameters.label: Start Date
inputParameters.name: startDate
inputParameters.description: Start date/time for the ad group (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM).

inputParameters.label: End Date
inputParameters.name: endDate
inputParameters.description: End date/time for the ad group (leave blank for ongoing).

inputParameters.label: Ad Group Budget
inputParameters.name: adGroupBudget
inputParameters.description: Budget for the ad group.

inputParameters.label: Ad Group Budget Type
inputParameters.name: adGroupBudgetType
inputParameters.description: Budget type for the ad group (daily or lifetime).

inputParameters.label: Bid
inputParameters.name: bid
inputParameters.description: Bid amount for the ad group (if applicable).

inputParameters.label: Ad Name
inputParameters.name: adName
inputParameters.description: Name of the ad (creative).

inputParameters.label: Ad Text
inputParameters.name: adText
inputParameters.description: Text caption or call-to-action text for the ad.

inputParameters.label: Ad Video ID
inputParameters.name: adVideoId
inputParameters.description: Video asset ID for the ad creative.

inputParameters.label: Report Level
inputParameters.name: reportLevel
inputParameters.description: Level of entity for which to retrieve the report (account, campaign, ad group, or ad).

inputParameters.label: Start Date
inputParameters.name: reportStartDate
inputParameters.description: Start date for the reporting period (YYYY-MM-DD).

inputParameters.label: End Date
inputParameters.name: reportEndDate
inputParameters.description: End date for the reporting period (YYYY-MM-DD).

inputParameters.label: Search Keyword
inputParameters.name: keyword
inputParameters.description: Keyword or name to search for creators.

inputParameters.label: Min Followers
inputParameters.name: minFollowers
inputParameters.description: Minimum number of followers filter for searching creators.

inputParameters.label: Max Followers
inputParameters.name: maxFollowers
inputParameters.description: Maximum number of followers filter for searching creators.

inputParameters.label: Country
inputParameters.name: country
inputParameters.description: Country code filter for creator search (e.g., US).

inputParameters.label: Creator ID
inputParameters.name: creatorId
inputParameters.description: Unique ID of the creator on the Creator Marketplace.
